nodes.text: Caraveg was a nightclub on Coruscant. Padmé Amidala and Daneska Varbarós discreetly met with Sabé and Captain Tonra in Caraveg while Cordé was standing in for the Senator at a function being held that same night. Amidala then had a run-in with fellow Senator Rush Clovis at the club, as he had left the function early and gone to the nightclub, where he recognized her and assumed she had also left early.
